extendedInfo.description: Discover something new for your Android every day! Download Drippler to get daily tips and discover new features, Android apps, Android updates, accessories and more. Join millions of users getting the latest:â Android tips & tricksâ Android apps & Android gamesâ Software updates & Firmware upgradesâ Android accessoriesâ Android themes & Android wallpapersâ Android widgets & Android toolsâ Android manuals & guides â Android secretsâ Pressâ "Turn Your Phone Into the Best Damn Phone It Can Be" - Gizmodoâ "A must-have for Android owners" - TheNextWebâ "Drippler offers news on Android updates and useful apps" - The New York Timesâ "Try Drippler. Itâs like a Flipboard edition for your mobile device" - GigaOmâ âThis app will tailor itself for your particular device, helping discover different types of thingsâ - Engadgetâ âA useful way to stay current on the rapidly changing mobile landscape" - TechCrunchâ Recommended by Samsung, Amazon, Verizon and AT&Tâ Reviewsâ "I knew about Android Jelly Bean Update for my galaxy S3 before everyone thanks to Drippler!"â "Drippler Does It All! One of only a handful of apps on Google store that provide you with truly useful Android info that is first previewed for your quick reading. It's like Flipboard for smartphone newbies with the best Android news, rumors and upgrade tipsââ "Love this app! New phone? No problem! Drippler keeps you informed about android apps, updates, tips and cool features your phone can do that you may not know about. I have Drippler on both my Nexus 7 tablet and Galaxy S3 phone and thanks to this news app learned how to update Android version to Android 4.2 and upgrade my Galaxy S3!"â "Better than all the news apps on Google Play store! I discovered the galaxy s4 users guide thanks to Drippler!"â Some of our content sources â Mobile brands: Samsung, Motorola, HTC, LG, Google Nexus, Sony Ericsson â Service providers: AT&T, Verizon, Sprint, T-Mobile, TracFoneâ Tech news blogs: TechCrunch, Gizmodo, TechRadar, eHow, CNET, Engadgetâ  Android blogs: Android Police, Android Central, Android and Me, AndroidPitâ Drippler supports Android Gingerbread (Android version 2.3) and upAndroid Honeycomb (Android 3.0, Android 3.1, Android 3.2), Android Ice Cream Sandwich (Android 4.0), Android Jelly Bean (Android 4.1, Android 4.2, Android 4.3)â Tested on Google Nexus 4, Google Nexus 7, Nexus 7 2 (Nexus 7 2013), Google Nexus 10, Samsung Galaxy S2,  Samsung Galaxy S3,  Samsung Galaxy S4, Samsung Galaxy Note, Samsung Galaxy Note 2, HTC One X, Samsung Galaxy Tab 2 7.0, Samsung Galaxy Tab 2 10.1, Samsung Galaxy Tab 3 7.0, Samsung Galaxy Tab 3 10.1, Motorola Droid Razr Maxx HD, Motorola Droid Razr HD, LG Optimus â  We LOVE connecting with our users, please reach out! reviews.title: Tailored genius
reviews.comment: Well laid out and great articles tailored to your specific device
reviews.author: Manue Sharpe

reviews.title: Useful
reviews.comment: It\'s really a useful and interesting app. I found new stuff and some good articles with handy tips.
reviews.author: Vanessa T.

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: This app is good overall, but still needs the function of adjusting font size. I\'m using galaxy note 2, and it\'s hurting my eyes, not to mention other devices.
reviews.author: Dennis Peng

reviews.title: Love Today\'s Update!
reviews.comment: The new compact design introduced today is a welcomed feature addition! App is a great one stop resource geared specifically to a particular product. Even if I only implement 10% of the suggestions, I still feel the information is of great value!
reviews.author: Jim Carter

reviews.title: Nice UI, great app overall
reviews.comment: I use it to stay up to date on all of the new android apps and their features. I adore it, thanks!
reviews.author: Jordan D

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: All news and stories about Android at one place.... Great job! I think there needs to be an option to switch to dark theme for night reading... Overall a must have app.
reviews.author: Anon Z

reviews.comment: It has improved a lot and info and tips are very useful
reviews.author: Juan Carlos Torres Lobelo

reviews.title: The best Android news!
reviews.comment: This is the best way to get Android news and reviews. It even keeps you up to date with your device!
reviews.author: Jason Moody

reviews.title: Very very handy...
reviews.comment: Keeps me updated about my SGS4. And provides lots of tips in form of shared articles
reviews.author: Amit Borkar

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Keeps me up to date about my S3 and other new Android news. Can sometimes Mac though. Still good though.
reviews.author: Steve Eby

reviews.title: Very nice
reviews.comment: Its a very nice app for those who are very much intrested in android. .
reviews.author: pankaj kumar Gupta

reviews.title: Amazing app
reviews.comment: I\'ve been using this app since I got an android mobile. It is getting better and better by every update.  Provides information about almost every new app and suggestion of apps are great. I love this app
reviews.author: Risheendra Dissanayake

reviews.comment: Great app! However,  for those of us who aren\'t tekkies I wish you\'d add a beginners mode or a search feature!
reviews.author: Elm Martin

reviews.title: Great on the Galaxy Note 8.0!
reviews.comment: I\'ve recently been reading several news about the Note 8.0 on Drippler just to get things updated. Until today, it has given many information, very useful to know. I recommend you guys with Galaxy Note 8.0 to install this app.  Thank you, Drippler :)
reviews.author: Edwin Mohammad

reviews.title: The Best!
reviews.comment: This should be the very first app on your phone and I can\'t imagine a reason to ever uninstall it. In fact, DARE I SAY: \"This would be the ONLY app that I would be happy to find PREinstalled on a new phone!\" ...there, I said it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome!!!!
reviews.comment: Keeps me updated with all things android. Just awesome

reviews.title: Really helpful
reviews.comment: I get information from New Phone Cases to new apps that help make things easier ^_^

reviews.title: Great app...
reviews.comment: Ove this app it has done somee wonders for my phones.... can\'t live without this app.

reviews.title: Nice app excellenct
reviews.comment: I always check updates only by this apps for my s3 and now lenovo s820

reviews.title: On the money app
reviews.comment: Very informative app. Keep up the good work.They are right on top of things.
